posts.post_content:
Posted By: Evan Adams
I am looking for an 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug Cap Anson. eadams24@yahoo.com

Posted By: barrysloate
I have one in my Nov 17 auction. It's lowgrade with a bit of touchup at a couple of corners, but it will probably be affordable. The website will be up the evening of Oct 30 and I will make an announcement on the board. Sincerely, Barry Sloate

Posted By: Judge Dred (Fred)
Barry,

30OCT05 is a long way away...  remember the audience you're dealing with here.  We're like children waiting for Santa Claus...  can't the 30th of October come early this year?

Posted By: barrysloate
I'm taking a short vacation Oct 20-30, part of the time of which I'll use to stuff catalogs into envelopes. It will come quickly, I asure you.  Barry

Posted By: Anson
I was hoping it belonged to me.  Well, it does have my name on it!

Barry, can you get me on your list somehow?
